--create topic sensor_readings;
use test;
0 rows returned
create source latest_sensor_readings(
    sensor_id bigint,
    country varchar,
    city varchar,
    reading_1 bigint,
    reading_2 double,
    reading_3 decimal(10,2),
    primary key (sensor_id)
) with (
    brokername = "testbroker",
    topicname = "sensor_readings",
    headerencoding = "json",
    keyencoding = "json",
    valueencoding = "json",
    columnselectors = (
        "k.k0",
        "v.v1",
        "v.v2",
        "v.v3",
        "v.v4",
        "v.v5"
    )
    properties = (
    )
);
0 rows returned

--load data dataset_1;

select * from latest_sensor_readings order by sensor_id;
|sensor_id|country|city|reading_1|reading_2|reading_3|
|1|uk|london|1000|192.23|123456.33|
|2|usa|new york|-1501|-563.34|-765432.34|
|3|au|sydney|372|7890.765|98766554.34|
|4|uk|london|2012|675.21|9873.74|
|5|uk|bristol|-192|-876.23|-736464.38|
|6|usa|new york|-346|-763.97|252673.83|
|7|au|melbourne|0|764.32|9686.12|
|8|uk|bristol|453|9867.99|87475.36|
|9|usa|san francisco|-3736|-543.12|-8575.38|
|10|au|sydney|2163|0|-38373.36|
10 rows returned

-- MAX;
-- ===;

-- No group by;

create materialized view test_mv_1 as select max(reading_1) from latest_sensor_readings;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_1;
|max(reading_1)|
|2163|
1 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_2 as select max(reading_2) from latest_sensor_readings;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_2;
|max(reading_2)|
|9867.99|
1 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_3 as select max(reading_3) from latest_sensor_readings;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_3;
|max(reading_3)|
|98766554.340000000000000000000000000000|
1 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_4 as select max(reading_1) from latest_sensor_readings having max(reading_1) < 0;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_4;
|max(reading_1)|
0 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_5 as select max(reading_2) from latest_sensor_readings having max(reading_2) < 0;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_5;
|max(reading_2)|
0 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_6 as select max(reading_3) from latest_sensor_readings having max(reading_3) < 0;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_6;
|max(reading_3)|
0 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_7 as select max(reading_1) from latest_sensor_readings having max(reading_1) > 0;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_7;
|max(reading_1)|
|2163|
1 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_8 as select max(reading_2) from latest_sensor_readings having max(reading_2) > 0;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_8;
|max(reading_2)|
|9867.99|
1 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_9 as select max(reading_3) from latest_sensor_readings having max(reading_3) > 0;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_9;
|max(reading_3)|
|98766554.340000000000000000000000000000|
1 rows returned

-- Group by one column;

create materialized view test_mv_10 as select country, max(reading_1) from latest_sensor_readings group by country;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_10 order by country;
|country|max(reading_1)|
|au|2163|
|uk|2012|
|usa|-346|
3 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_11 as select country, max(reading_2) from latest_sensor_readings group by country;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_11 order by country;
|country|max(reading_2)|
|au|7890.765|
|uk|9867.99|
|usa|-543.12|
3 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_12 as select country, max(reading_3) from latest_sensor_readings group by country;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_12 order by country;
|country|max(reading_3)|
|au|98766554.340000000000000000000000000000|
|uk|123456.330000000000000000000000000000|
|usa|252673.830000000000000000000000000000|
3 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_13 as select country, max(reading_1) from latest_sensor_readings group by country having max(reading_1) > -0;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_13 order by country;
|country|max(reading_1)|
|au|2163|
|uk|2012|
2 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_14 as select country, max(reading_2) from latest_sensor_readings group by country having max(reading_2) > -0;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_14 order by country;
|country|max(reading_2)|
|au|7890.765|
|uk|9867.99|
2 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_15 as select country, max(reading_3) from latest_sensor_readings group by country having max(reading_3) > 200000;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_15 order by country;
|country|max(reading_3)|
|au|98766554.340000000000000000000000000000|
|usa|252673.830000000000000000000000000000|
2 rows returned

-- Group by two columns;

create materialized view test_mv_16 as select country, city, max(reading_1) from latest_sensor_readings group by country, city;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_16 order by country, city;
|country|city|max(reading_1)|
|au|melbourne|0|
|au|sydney|2163|
|uk|bristol|453|
|uk|london|2012|
|usa|new york|-346|
|usa|san francisco|-3736|
6 rows returned

|usa|san francisco|-543.12|

|uk|london|123456.330000000000000000000000000000|
|usa|new york|252673.830000000000000000000000000000|

create materialized view test_mv_19 as select country, city, max(reading_1) from latest_sensor_readings group by country, city having max(reading_1) > 1;

select * from test_mv_19 order by country, city;

|au|sydney|2163|
|uk|bristol|453|
|uk|london|2012|

-- without aggregate in projection;

create materialized view test_mv_22 as select country, city from latest_sensor_readings group by country, city having max(reading_1) > 1;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_22 order by country, city;
|country|city|
|au|sydney|
|uk|bristol|
|uk|london|
3 rows returned

create materialized view test_mv_23 as select country, city from latest_sensor_readings group by country, city having max(reading_2) > 1;

select * from test_mv_23 order by country, city;
|country|city|
|au|melbourne|
|au|sydney|
|uk|bristol|
|uk|london|

create materialized view test_mv_24 as select country, city from latest_sensor_readings group by country, city having max(reading_3) > 1;
0 rows returned
select * from test_mv_24 order by country, city;
|country|city|
|au|melbourne|
|au|sydney|
|uk|bristol|
|uk|london|
|usa|new york|
5 rows returned

drop materialized view test_mv_24;
